name: 3d Space Shooter (def !willy)
description:
Shoot enemies, Get points, Avoid asteroids, and Upgrade your UFO! Be the strongest in the galaxy.

Don't too get close to the Black holes or the Sun!

Go into Wormholes when you are in danger!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Looking

LMB: Shoot less strong bullets but at a faster rate

RMB: Shoot stronger bullets but at a slower rate

Q: Spawn asteroids when you get the upgrade

E: Spawn Wormholes when you get the upgrade

R: Spawn Black Holes when you get the upgrade
